Oct. 5, 2002 D West Wales BBA Contest (Fourth Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Fourth Section) 40 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-fourth-section
None
Ammanford, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - solo cornet - Ystradgynlais. Prizes - 1st £120, 2nd £80, 3rd £60. 4 bands competed.
Sept. 28, 2011, 1:12 p.m. July 3, 2020, 9:44 p.m.
1 Goodwick Brass Dennis Wheeler
2 Ystradgynlais Public Band Aled Jones
3 Crwbin Silver Band Julian Jones
4 Cwmtawe District Youth Band Wayne Pedrick
